hero.title: Kamalo City
hero.subtitle: A Taste of Africa. A Story in Every Bite.
hero.description: Experience authentic African cuisine, traditional vegetables, premium hookah, grooming, and weekend entertainment — all under one roof in Goodwood, Cape Town.
hero.hours: Open 7 days a week: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM

story.title: Our Story: From Rubble to Rhythm
story.description1: Kamalo City began in 2023 as a cultural hub where African heritage meets unforgettable flavor. Today, it's one of Cape Town's most loved food spots.
story.description2: What was once rubble has been rebuilt with purpose — creating a vibrant destination for food, music, and community spirit that honors our ancestors in every dish we serve.
story.point1: From rubble to revival – Founded in 2023 with vision and determination
story.point2: Authentic African flavors – Modern experience with traditional recipes
story.point3: Complete cultural hub – Food, music, events, and lifestyle services
story.quote: From rubble to rhythm: revived in 2023, today Kamalo City beats with flavor, community and soul.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.description: From vision to reality, discover the milestones that shaped Kamalo City.

2023.title: Rebuilt and Opened
2023.description: From abandoned space to cultural hotspot — Kamalo City opened its doors with a vision of authentic African dining.

2024.title: Launched Events and Live Entertainment
2024.description: Expanded with weekend entertainment, private event hosting, and additional lifestyle services including barbershop and hookah.

2025.title: Became Top Destination
2025.description: Established as Cape Town's premier African dining and entertainment venue, beloved by locals and visitors alike.

services.title: More Than Just Dining
services.description: Discover the complete Kamalo City experience with entertainment, events, and lifestyle services

liveEntertainment.title: Live Entertainment
liveEntertainment.description: Music nights, DJs, and cultural showcases every Friday and Saturday

privateBookings.title: Private Bookings
privateBookings.description: Full venue hire for birthdays, corporate events, and celebrations up to 80 guests

preOrders.title: Pre-Orders & Catering
preOrders.description: Order ahead for pickup or enjoy our full dining experience with catering options

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle Services
lifestyle.description: Premium hookah lounge, signature fragrances, professional barbershop, and game nights

menu.title: Featured Dishes
menu.description: Discover our most beloved African dishes, crafted with authentic flavors and traditional recipes

pricing.title: Menu Pricing Information
pricing.dailySpecials: All Daily Specials are R80 with pap or R90 with rice
pricing.note: *Note: In-restaurant prices differ from Uber Eats pricing.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Are Saying
testimonials.description: Real experiences from our valued guests

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.description: Explore the vibrant world of Kamalo City through our collection of moments, from delicious cuisine to exciting events and premium services.
gallery.experienceDescription: Ready to create your own memories? Visit us for authentic African cuisine and entertainment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about your Kamalo City experience

footer.description: Where rich African heritage meets unforgettable flavor. Come for the taste — stay for the vibe.
footer.tagline: Whether you're here to dine, unwind, or celebrate — Kamalo City is where every moment becomes a memory.

reservations.title: Reserve Your Experience
reservations.description: Looking for the perfect venue in Cape Town? Kamalo City offers intimate dinners, birthday parties, corporate events, and more. Enjoy authentic cuisine, vibrant ambiance, and excellent service.
reservations.openHours: Open: 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM, 7 days a week
reservations.successMessage: Reservation request sent! We'll confirm within 2 hours.
reservations.confirmationNote: We'll confirm your booking within 2 hours. For urgent bookings, call us directly.
reservations.contactDescription: Contact us now to secure your table or discuss private event options.
reservations.specialRequirementsNote: For special requirements or large groups, please call

about.quote: Inspired by our ancestors, shared with the world.
about.title: A Legacy Brought to Life
about.description: Kamalo City was born from rubble and rebuilt with purpose. Since 2023, we've grown into a destination for food, music, and community spirit.
about.foundersDescription1: Born from the passion to bring ancestral flavors to the heart of Cape Town, Kamalo City merges authentic African food with a modern social experience. We serve as a cultural hub — where people gather, relax, and enjoy life.
about.foundersDescription2: Kamalo City was founded by Pitchou Ntumba and his wife, who together have created Cape Town's premier African dining and entertainment destination. Their combined vision and expertise in hospitality have transformed this space into a vibrant celebration of African cuisine and culture.
about.foundersDescription3: Under their leadership, Kamalo City has evolved into more than just a restaurant – it's a cultural hub where people come together to enjoy authentic African cuisine, premium shisha experiences, professional grooming services, and entertainment.
about.ctaDescription: Ready to be part of the Kamalo City experience? Visit us and taste the passion in every dish.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Need directions? Want to make a booking? We're here to help — contact us anytime.
contact.visitDescription: Make a reservation or just drop by for an authentic African dining experience in Cape Town.
